lines.text: Suddenly a thought strikes Mathias = _being dead mens escaping all earthly woes... It means no more enemies. - No more creditors. - No more hostile wife. - No more Mother-in-Law. - Being dead means FREEDOM
ROME. A man without a past arrives in the Eternal City! Unhindered. NAMELESS... _a new man... And with a new heart...
Freedom has something bitter about it.
